marklogic.body:
Hats to him for having the stones to stand up and speak God's Word to a 'captive' audience. If there was a point system, he'd be ringing like a winning slot machine IMO. He was arrested just like a Jeremiah was and for the same reason. The authorities didn't like what he had to say. The people there felt uncomfortable, no doubt, because they are married to their lusts.
Telling people that they are sinners and must repent to God for forgiveness by accepting His son, Jesus or else they'll Burn in the lake of fire isn't going to get you a piece of cake. It means rejection by the world at large and persecution by the authorities. We love our neighbors, we can't stop ringing the alarm bell now, we're SO close! This Pastor's arrest is a badge of honor, not disgrace. Hallelujah brother! Shame on the authorities and whomever Dialed 9-1-1.
